title: Behind The Song: Red Velvet's "Zimzalabim" w/ Caesar & Loui
description:
We are so excited to introduce a brand-new segment called "Behind The Song". In this segment, we invite artists, songwriters, and producers to break down their songs and provide insight into the creative process behind the birth of a hit song. On the first "Behind The Song" episode, we are joined by famous Swedish songwriting duo Caesar & Loui. Caesar & Loui are the creative geniuses behind some of K-Pop's biggest hits - including one of our all-time favorites Red Velvet’s - Red Flavor! They've also written and produced singles for Super Junior, EXO-CBX, TWICE, Monsta X, and Girls Generation (to name a few). Tune in to this episode to learn how Caesar & Loui wrote their latest hit - Red Velvet’s ZIMZALABIM! Make sure to subscribe to @daebakshow (IT’S FREE) and leave us a comment, rating and/or review on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Soundcloud, or YouTube. Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at www.daebakshow.com!
 
 See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
